name: Robotic Submarine
description: Designed for the Robosub 2025 competition, the robotic submarine is an advanced, underwater autonomous vehicle designed for complex exploration and manipulation tasks.

name: Timer System
description: The Timer System, developed as a volunteer project for the local American Ninja Warrior Gym, is an electronic system for timing obstacle course completions. It features a simple interface: green button to start, red to stop. Both buttons can be held for reset. A key fob provides remote control for these functions.

name: Climbing Wall
description: A program that allows you to add and keep track of single and reoccurring events.

name: Board Game
description: Project for IB Comp Sci IA 2018-2019: Computer Version of the board game Kingdoms and Knights. This program allows players to play the board game Kingdoms and Knights on the computer. Kingdoms and Knights is a strategy board game created by: Zach Greenberg, Jackson Elder, and Hayden Soelberg
